name: Apigateway-lambda
body:
1. Install Slack
1. Join the 'sdawsmagicnight' Slack channel
1. Create a GitHub Web Hook for Pull Requests using API Gateway and Lambda.
    1. https://developer.github.com/webhooks/creating/
1. Send a message to the Slack Channel when a PR has been changed.
    1. Us Team Name (Ex: "Team 13")
    1. Use a unique Team Icon.
    1. Summarize the pull request
    1. Message should contain a link to
        * User
        * Pull Request
        * Repository
1. Create a Slack Command to close, merge or reopen a Pull Request using API Gateway and Lambda (Bonus)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
